metadata.synopsis: Dialog in which a Flaming Fist declares that they are going to raise an alarm.The Flaming Fist on the next turn uses a horn to sound the alarm.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_Agoto 16; 43; 200, this will teleport you inside the Wyrm Rock Fortress and trigger a trespassing dialogChoose "Attack" in the dialog.One of the Flaming Fists will use this dialog.

0.text: Where are the others? I'm calling for backup!
